name: NOYO-!
detailed_description:
Now, now, there was a girl and a biped cat at a certain place.
The girl's name is "Noyo", and the cat's name is "Michel".

We was always peaceful and calm, but suddenly, everyone got crazy
because of the "DokuDenpa" from the smartphone!

But Noyo was fine as she did not have a smartphone.

"I will help everyone! noyo-!"
"Meow!"

Now, a girl and a biped cat have gone on an adventure.
...With you.
about_the_game:

short_description: Suddenly, people got crazy by "DokuDenpa" from smartphones! JRPG to which one girl and one biped cat go adventure to help everyone!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel CoreDuo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
